subject: QS news update
msgSnippet: I have modifying the news according to users suggestions. You might have noticed that acronyms now appear in Roman letters. (This does lead to some errors. For
messageBody:
I have modifying the news according to users suggestions. You might have
noticed that acronyms now appear in Roman letters. (This does lead to
some errors. For example, when the name of a city appears in all
capitals at the beginning of an article, the program thinks the word an
acronym and does not convert it to QS.)

I can also include news from other categories, such as sports, strange
news, popular stories, entertainment, etc. Just let me know and keep the
suggestions coming.

Paul

I have modifying the news according to users suggestions. You might have 
noticed that acronyms now appear in Roman letters. (This does lead to 
some errors. For example, when the name of a city appears in all 
capitals at the beginning of an article, the program thinks the word an 
acronym and does not convert it to QS.)

I can also include news from other categories, such as sports, strange 
news, popular stories, entertainment, etc. Just let me know and keep the 
suggestions coming.

Paul
